questions.name: Evaluate these speakers
rows: They used their nerves to project enthusiasm.
They made the topic relevant to their audience.
They expressed their ideas clearly and simply.
They showed their sincerity and passion for the subject.
They used their hands and gestures well.
They used eye contact well to connect to the audience.
They used a range of expression to add drama and humour.
They used pauses to give the audience time to think.
They used slides and visuals well to reinforce their message.
